api_list.name: getPicture
api_list.description:
Requests to this endpoint will return status and setAt timestamp.
If the profile has set status as private you will get an error.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-profile-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/whatsappApi/getPicture"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-profile-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: checkBusiness
api_list.description:
Requests to this endpoint will return true and business informations if the number is a Whatsapp business user, or false if it's not.
Business informations returned will contain Address, Description, Business category, Website, Email, Timezone and Schedule, all values returned if are available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-profile-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/whatsappApi/checkBusiness"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-profile-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: checkNumber
api_list.description: Requests to this endpoint will return true if the number is a Whatsapp user, or false if it's not.

        }
